name: Sorting
objective:
Sort the %%icon icon-egg$%% eggs from the smallest on the left to the largest on the right.

%%icon mdi mdi-information-outline$%% At the end, the %%icon icon-egg$%% eggs must be on the floor in the same line as at the beginning.
